assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Oral exam, alternative to defending a dissertation
description.et: Suuline komisjonieksam; lõpueksam on alternatiiviks lõputöö kaitsmisele

objectives.en: Aimed at integrating, testing and evaluating the knowledge acquired during the studies
objectives.et: Integreerida, kontrollida ja hinnata stuudiumi vältel õpitud teadmisi

learning_outcomes.en:
Outcomes:
Student demonstrates overall cultural and subject area -related knowledge;  is able to integrate and link the knowledge with concrete situation; identifies him/herself as educator
